name: Death Pirate
description: Death Pirate is a new mix of shoot'em up and RPG with a gripping story and an original soundtrack. Fly through the city of South Town to unravel the mystery of the Death Pirate. The game features 7 playable characters and 26 unique stages.
minimum_requirements: OS: Vista Memory: 500 MB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 600 MB available space

reviews.review_text: I dunno I mean I kind of enjoy the art here . . but everything about this game is a mess. The story is . . uh . . there i think, all the buttons do the same thing in menu which seems to be nothing. I mean clearly there's a skeleton here for something better but I think they just gave up and moved on . .I mean you cant change the screen or volume or or ...ugh what a waste
